de.sciss.jcollider
Class ServerOptions

java.lang.Object
  de.sciss.jcollider.ServerOptions

public class ServerOptions
extends Object

A class full of getter/setter methods to describe the options to boot a local scsynth server

Version:
0.291, 14-Oct-06
Author:
Hanns Holger Rutz

Method Detail

toOptionList

public List toOptionList(int port)
Creates a list of all the server options, omitting those whose value equals the default value.

Parameters:
port - the port number to use for the -u option
Returns:
a list containing String elements of the server options

toOptionList

public List toOptionList(int port,
                         boolean verbose)
Creates a list of all the server options.

Parameters:
port - the port number to use for the -u option
verbose - if true, elements for all parameters are generated, otherwise only elements for parameters that are different from scsynth's defaults are generated
Returns:
a list containing String elements of the server options

getFirstPrivateBus

public int getFirstPrivateBus()
Utility method to return the audio bus offset for the first bus which is not connected to audio hardware interface channels. This value is only valid, if the server was booted with this options

Returns:
the index of the first audio bus not connected to audio hardware

optionListToStringArray

public static String[] optionListToStringArray(List list)
Converts a list of string elements to one an array of strings

Parameters:
list - a list whose elements are Strings
Returns:
array of those elements in the same order as they appeared in the list

stringArrayToConsoleString

public static String stringArrayToConsoleString(String[] array)
Converts an array of strings to a string which can be used in a Un*x console. This assembles all elements with space characters between them. If an element contains a space character, it will be put in quotes.

Parameters:
array - parameters to a un*x process
Returns:
concatenated command string
